content.prompt: Patterns of migration in the United States during the 1930s and 1940s were most similar to which of the following earlier patterns of migration?

choices.label: The internal migration of Northerners to the South during the period of Reconstruction
The restrictions placed on Chinese immigration to the United States during the 1880s
The internal relocation of American Indians to reservations from the 1860s to the 1890s
The immigration of Europeans to Northern cities in the United States during the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
